Package hm.binkley.inject

Guice extras.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DemoMain.DemoMainConfig  
    Main.DeclareOptions  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DemoMain
    DemoMain needs documentation.
    InjectedServicesModule
    InjectedServicesModule installs injected Guice modules annotated with MetaInfServices on Guice Module via the JDK service loader.
    JMXTypeListener
    JMXTypeListener registers JMX mbeans using pojo-mbean.
    JMXTypeListener.MBeanMatcher  
    JOptSimpleModule
    JOptSimpleModule integrates JOptSimple into Guice.
    LifecycleModule
    LifecycleModule enables the JSR-250 annotations, @PostConstruct and @PreDestroy, in Guice via the lifegycle library.
    LogMessageModule
    LogMessageModule needs documentation.
    Main<C extends Config>
    Main is a sample guing together the Guice modules for a trivial application bootstrap.
    OwnerModule<C extends Config>
    OwnerModule is light-weight wiring of an OWNER API config instance into Guice.
    ServicesModule
    ServicesModule installs Guice modules annotated with MetaInfServices on Guice Module via the JDK service loader.
    TraceModule
    TraceModule is a Guice module to enable tracing via SLF4J of method entry/exit and exceptions thrown (exception Errors).
    UncheckedThrow
    UncheckedThrow throws checked exceptions as unchecked.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Trace
    Marks a class or method for entry/exit tracing, if assertions enabled for it.

Package hm.binkley.inject Description

Guice extras.
Author:
B. K. Oxley (binkley)
